old:
セシリーを助けた覚者たちが図らずも渡航した先は
島だったという報告を受け、騎士団を中心とする捜索
隊が船出する予定だった。しかし、各地の魔物退治に
人手を奪われ、思うように進んでいなかった

　そこでわたしは、覚者たちの力を借りるよう、騎士
団に助言し、覚者たちには引き受けるよう根回しをし
ておいた

　結果、騎士団の魔物討伐は軌道に乗り、ほどなく捜
索隊も出せるようになることだろう

　尚、嵐の夜以降に現れるようになった新手の魔物た
ちを、レスタニア土着の魔物と区別するため、以降、
侵食魔と呼ぶこととする
new:
The report received stated that the Arisen who had helped Cecily unintentionally ended up traveling to an island. A search party, led by the Knights, had planned to set sail. However, due to manpower being taken away for monster subjugation in various places, things weren't going as smoothly as expected.

Therefore, I advised the Knights to seek the assistance of the Arisen and made arrangements for them to take on the task.

As a result, the Knights' monster extermination efforts are on track, and soon the search party will be able to set out.

Furthermore, the newly emerged monsters that appear after stormy nights will be referred to as "Corrupted" in order to distinguish them from the local monsters in Lestania.
